text: ocused personality could be tempted to utilize the emotional escapism of denial in order to avoid confrontation with a real- ity it was never trained to face, my greater Eternal Self “simply knew better”. Denial gets you nowhere fast— it is simply a way of creating for yourself a “glass house” to live in, and if you are going to hide out in glass houses you’d better hope that all of your neighbors are friendly and none of them like to play baseball. Denial of the new information was not an option for me, for deep within me I knew what the GA had revealed was the truth, and that in denying this truth I would not only be deluding myself, but I would be mis- leading anyone who depended on me to accurately report the contents of CDT-Plates and the GA dispensations. 248
